stories.text:
We are very proud to share that we have released a new and expanded version of Kubescape. This is the first-ever K8s open-source tool that scans and test according to multiple security and compliance frameworks including the NSA-CISA and the MITRE ATT&CK. The new version also ... - Has a user-friendly UI for streamlined scans and test management. - Provides an instantly calculated risk score based on the current scan and easy access to a history of past scans. - Allows Kubernetes admins to manage exceptions and mark acceptable risk levels. - Empowers users to build and customize their own compliance frameworks

Kubescape has already more than 4k stars on GitHub and thousands of downloads, and it is free to register.

You can try it yourself here: https://github.com/armosec/kubescape
stories.title: New and expanded version of Kubescape is released
